item.title: MTS-248 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on MTS-248 west. Distance to Opheim.

item.title: MT-13 North at MTS-248
item.description: MT-13 North at MTS-248 in Scobey.

item.description: MT-13 North at MTS-248 west to Opheim.

item.description: MT-13 North approaching MTS-248 in Scobey.

item.title: MT-13 North at MT-5
item.description: MT-13 north at MT-5. Use MT-5 east for Plentywood. Continue north on MT-13 for Canada.

item.title: End MT-5 West at MT-13
item.description: End MT-5 west at MT-13. Use MT-13 north for MTS-248.

item.title: MT-5 West Approaching MT-13
item.description: MT-5 West Approaching MT-13 in Scobey. This is the western end of MT-5.

item.title: End MT-5 West at MT-13
item.description: End MT-5 west at MT-13. Use MT-13 north for Canada; MT-13 south for Wolf Point.
